slide1.title: INTERNET OF THINGS (IoT)
slide1.description: Integration of work quality monitoring, work time efficiency, and data visualization are the trends we are working on today. Give us your concept, we will help you realize your IoT development.

slide2.title: HIGH-ACCURACY DATA PROVIDER
slide2.description: The use of UAV (Drone) technology, DGPS (Differential Global Positioning System), LIDAR (Light Detection and Ranging), and other technologies that we have, will make it easier for you to answer the needs of quality data.

slide3.title: ECOSYSTEM RESTORATION INITIATIVE
slide3.description: Through a conservation approach that rests on the pillars of protection, preservation and sustainable use, we facilitate communities in improving and managing ecosystem functions.

slide4.title: SPECIALIZED TRAINING PROGRAMS
slide4.description: We provide training for participatory mapping, spatial planning, disaster, spatial analysis, and other specific targets to help future decision-making.

slide5.title: RESEARCH & DATA ANALYSIS SERVICES
slide5.description: We provide research and data analysis services for multidisciplines. Natural resources, carbon, changing socio-cultural patterns, and environmental carrying capacity are part of our expertise.

siapaKami.title: Who We Are
siapaKami.description: We, Loka Spasial Nusantara (Loka Spasial), are a non-construction consultancy company offering services across various sectors: information systems and technology, research (social, economic, environmental), spatial planning, technical inspection, special target monitoring and surveys, photogrammetry, land registration/cadastral, training and capacity building, as well as community empowerment in fisheries, agriculture, and forestry.

aktivitasKami.title: Our Activities
aktivitasKami.description: We contribute to strategic projects at both regional and national levels, initiated by government, private sectors, organizations, or individuals to support performance achievements. You can see the distribution of our work on the following map:

mitraKami.title: Partners
mitraKami.description: We build partnerships with various stakeholders from different backgrounds. We welcome collaboration with all stakeholders to improve the economy, knowledge, and public awareness, and to make the planet better.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.description: Do you still have questions after reading our website? Contact us via the following form or send us an email directly. We look forward to hearing from you.

karir.title: Job Vacancy
karir.emailBody:
Hello Loka Spasial Team,
I am interested in applying for the {{title}} position.
Thank you.

fotoUdara.title: AERIAL PHOTOS
fotoUdara.description: Mapping and visual documentation services using high-resolution drones capable of capturing detailed and precise aerial imagery. Used for survey needs, area monitoring, topographic mapping, and supporting fast and accurate spatial-data-based decision making.

iot.title: INTERNET OF THINGS (IoT)
iot.description: We design and implement sensor-based systems connected via the internet to monitor, measure, and control various parameters in the field in real-time. This solution improves operational efficiency and enables smarter, more responsive decision-making.

inspeksi.title: TECHNICAL INSPECTION
inspeksi.description: Using technology such as drones and special sensors to inspect infrastructure, buildings, or other strategic assets. This process simplifies damage detection, routine monitoring, and technical documentation without disrupting field operations.

penelitian.title: RESEARCH
penelitian.description: We support research activities through data collection, processing, and analysis using technology, in the fields of environment, social, and technical. Each research project is developed with a scientific approach and methodologies relevant to the needs of partners and communities.

agrikultur.title: AGRICULTURE
agrikultur.description: The application of technology to boost productivity and efficiency in the agricultural sector and rural development. This service includes land mapping, crop monitoring, and integration of information systems to support development based on data and local needs.

telematika.title: TELEMATICS
telematika.description: This service includes tracking and communication systems based on digital technology such as GPS and IoT, enabling accurate monitoring of moving assets. It is suitable for vehicles, ships, or other devices requiring full operational visibility.

webapp.title: WEB APPLICATION
webapp.description: We provide digital system development services, including informative websites, functional applications, and interactive dashboards. Each product is designed to meet user needs by considering UX/UI aspects, access speed, and integration with existing systems.

lainnya.title: OTHER SERVICES
lainnya.description: In addition to our core services, we also provide technology solutions tailored to our partners' specific needs, ranging from information system development, data integration, to technical training. Every solution is developed with flexibility and adaptability according to your organizationâ€™s goals and challenges.
